oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effectiveness of Calcium Propionate Gels
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sanchez, W. K.
Higgins, J. J.
Guy, M. A.
Anderson, M. L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Oral calcium gels
blood calcium
periparturient dairy cows
calcium chloride
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Oral calcium gels are used to elevate blood calcium of periparturient dairy cows. Calcium chloride is the most commonly used ingredient in these products. Although calcium chloride increases blood Ca, it may cause metabolic acidosis and thus is often contraindicated.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1995; 234
